content.raw:
[Jenkins results](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ignition_transport/job/ignition_transport-any-devel-trusty-amd64/15/testReport/) have a lot of failed tests; is this due to the shared partition name problem?

I noticed a failing test on Jenkins that also failed consistently on my machine:

`twoProcessesPubSub` fails about 9/10 times on test `twoProcPubSub.PubSubTwoProcsTwoNodesSubscriber`.
